versioning_proposal.highlight: V1.0.0 versioning proposal covers 71 methods through Cancun fork
GitHub release process can proceed; Felix will create V1 release
Test runner will target released version instead of latest
Block timestamp added to transaction object; tests need updating
Documentation versioning requires GitHub Actions updates for version selector

error_code_standardization.highlight: X-error-groups extension enables native validation without additional tooling
Spec generation now uses Go tools; translation validates errors during build
Error groups won't be embedded in final OpenRPC JSON; validation moves to build process

testing_infrastructure.highlight: Current conformance testing setup works well; tests tied to specific chain state
I.O. file interpreter library may move to execution-apis repository for reuse

stalled_prs.highlight: GraphQL API considered unmaintained; removal being evaluated
Old stalled PRs should be recreated fresh without baggage
New proposals should be introduced one-per-ACDE for better voting success

action_items.action: Update RPC tests to include block timestamp in transaction object
Implement docs versioning with version selector in GitHub Actions
Update Go toolchain to support error code validation during spec build
Recreate stalled PRs as fresh proposals; introduce one per ACDE call

decisions.decision: Max use gas (PR #746) deferred from V1; not ready for initial release
X-error-groups won't be embedded in published OpenRPC; validation at build time only
GraphQL tests and potentially GraphQL API itself to be deprecated/removed
Stalled PRs (tx pool, receipt proof, etc.) require EIP process; close old PRs

targets.target: V1.0.0 release after test regressions fixed and client pass rates restored
